column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I'm not a huge fan of deep dish
column2: because well it's basically a casserole - but if I'm in the mood for pizza casserole I'm going to have Lous. The classic cheese is my go-to
column3: you've got the perfect combo of buttery crust and gooey cheese to feed your soul during the winter. Oh
column4: and do yourself a favor and order the Calamari Fritti! SO GOOD.
